snippet.title: Incursion Red River || Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
We are so happy to finally announce our rebranding from PROJECT QUARANTINE to Incursion Red River. And we have great news, we will participate in the upcoming Steam Next Fest from the 5th-12th of February! 
The new demo will only be available during this time, so check it out!
Let us know in the comments what you think about the new setting and if you will check out the demo? 

See you on the battlefield!

---- links ----

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2116120/Incursion_Red_River/
https://twitter.com/IncursionRR
https://discord.gg/85wr66fqQq
